lead_paragraph: Technology and health care stocks took the largest losses. Retailers received more bad news as Kohl’s reported disappointing first-quarter results.

headline.print_headline: A Day of Churn Ends Tightly Mixed
headline.main: Market Is Mixed After Unemployment Claims Rise

snippet: Technology and health care stocks took the largest losses. Retailers received more bad news as Kohl’s reported disappointing first-quarter results.
abstract: Stocks end flat after turbulent day.
